description:
From our law office in Fayetteville, North Carolina, the attorneys at the Lanier Law Group P.A. provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Cumberland County and the surrounding areas who suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Regarded as one of our state's leading injury law firms, we have grown to include 11 total offices across North Carolina. During our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars for our plaintiff clients who have personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, sexual abuse, defective products, unsafe property conditions and other preventable tragedies. We can also assist with your workers' compensation or Social Security Disability claim, and we are prepared to do all we can to increase your chances for success.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and superior client service, our attorneys have earned many top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators. Moreover, we have received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients for our compassion and integrity and unwavering dedication to helping make their lives whole again following a debilitating injury or devastating loss.

Put a heavyweight in your corner to fight hard for you and to improve your likelihood of securing the maximum amount of compensation you deserve. For a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. by calling our law office or visiting our website. We also offer virtual consultations in an effort to help keep you and your loved ones safe in today's uncertain environment.
